title: Coward BLM Activist Storms Off Of An Interview (Ep 1648)
description:
In this episode I address the fireworks during my interview with coward BLM activist Hawk Newsome. Don’t miss this. 

News Picks:


Joy Reid is the biggest fraud in media.

Biden finally admits printing money causes inflation.


What happens when all the media narratives collapse?

It’s time for massive media corrections on Russia hoax. 


Another hoax about our military, debunked.

Twitter only had standards for conservatives.
